Text: Ăr det nĂĽgon som har hittat svenska eller engelska subbar till denna??

snoofyx,

You wish you Yanky dickhead!
This movie is great. Pity about the missing subtitles.

Ok I found the Subtitles

http://www.opensubtitles.com/en/subtitles/183745/11-commandements-les-en

Anyone know how to make em work with the movie?

How to play this with English subs:

1)go to the link that Arash.au provided and download the file

2)unzip

3)get VLC media player

4)play the movie with VLC

5)right click and go Video>Subtitles track>Open file

6)open the subtitle file the you downloaded

7)enjoy
